name: Devansh Khanna

introduction: MBA at Delhi School of Business, experience in sales & account management, passion for AI-driven decision-making.

summary: MBA student at Delhi School of Business specializing in data analytics, AI/ML, and strategic account management. I bridge the gap between business strategy and technical execution, with a strong focus on data-driven decision making and AI applications in business.

description: Generated ₹59K revenue through 200+ calls and 61 field visits
Optimized 1,200+ lead database, improving quality scores by 40%
Launched new Karaoke service line from concept to execution
Managed ₹5+ crore revenue portfolio & business planning for OEM accounts (Hyzon, Kohler, Mitsubishi), including RFQ handling and pricing strategy
Orchestrated end-to-end supply chain: demand forecasting, EDI monitoring, and export logistics (CHA/Forwarder coordination) for on-time delivery
Automated ERP reporting with Excel VBA (87% time reduction) and developed Power BI dashboards to improve pricing accuracy by 12%
Led new program launches from sales proposals to commercial execution

projects.name: AI Resume Enhancer
projects.subtitle: ML-powered Recommendation
projects.description: Comprehensive ML-powered recruitment automation system with three integrated modules for end-to-end candidate evaluation.
projects.impact: 70% reduction in recruitment screening time; 85% accuracy in placement prediction.

modules.title: MODULE 1: Resume Parser & Scoring Engine
implementation: Resume parsing libraries for data extraction
Generative AI integration for intelligent analysis
automationFeatures: Automated Data Extraction: Parsing libraries eliminate manual resume reading and data entry
AI-Powered Analysis: Generative AI model automatically evaluates resume content without human review
Instant Scoring: Automated ATS scoring system removes manual evaluation time
Intelligent Recommendations: AI-generated feedback without recruiter intervention

modules.title: MODULE 2: Placement Prediction Model
implementation: Trained ML model on historical placement datasets
Deployed on Render for real-time inference
automationFeatures: Automated Prediction Pipeline: ML model on Render provides instant predictions without manual analysis
Real-time API Inference: RESTful endpoints automate prediction requests and responses
Dataset-Driven Learning: Model automatically learns patterns from historical placement data
Continuous Availability: Render deployment ensures 24/7 automated prediction service

modules.title: MODULE 3: AI-Powered Recommendation Engine
implementation: Integrated system combining parsed data and ML predictions
automationFeatures: End-to-End Workflow Automation: Complete pipeline from resume upload to recommendation without manual steps
Cross-Module Integration: Automated data flow between parsing, prediction, and recommendation systems
Intelligent Synthesis: AI automatically combines multiple data sources for comprehensive insights

details.stack: Python • XGBoost • Generative AI API • Pandas • Parsing Libraries • Render • ML Automation

projects.name: Social Media Brand Performance Analysis (QSR)
projects.subtitle: Data Analyst | Independent Project
projects.description: Lack of data-driven insights into the social media engagement strategies of major QSR brands in India. Scraped Instagram data using ParseHub and performed comparative analysis using Python (Pandas, Seaborn) to evaluate engagement metrics.
projects.impact: Identified key content drivers and performance trends for McDonald's, Domino's, and KFC to optimize brand strategy.
